instructions: Open the Camera app. Tap on the Live Photos icon at the top. It looks like a set of concentric circles and turns yellow when the feature is on. Compose your shot. Hold your iPhone steady and press the shutter button. Hold the phone steady for two more seconds. Live Photos captures one and a half seconds before you tap the shutter button and one and a half seconds after.
Open the Photos app. Find and open your Live Photo. Swipe up to reveal Effects . Swipe right till you see Long Exposure . Tap on it and wait a second.
